sentences.sContent: Each child had participated in extracurricular activities at school.
sentences.sCn: 每个孩子都参加了学校的课外活动。

sentences.sContent: ...participation in extracurricular activities and involvement in their children’s education...
...But the priorities of many undergraduates are with extracurricular activities...
...that these extracurricular jobs were an effort on the part of the workers to regain their dignity after suffering the degradation of repetitive assembly line work in the factory...

trans.tranOther: extracurricular activities are not part of the course that a student is doing at a school or college
